Class Settings

java.lang.Object
com.example.Settings
public class Settings extends Object
The Settings class represents the settings configuration for the game. It includes options for background music (BGM) and sound effects (SFX) volumes, parental controls, time limits, and other settings. It also provides functionality to load settings or items from a JSON file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Settings

      public Settings()
      Default constructor for Gson (required for deserialization).

    • Settings

      public Settings(int BGM, int SFX, boolean parentControl, boolean revivePet, String timeLimit)
      Constructs a Settings object with the specified values.
      Parameters:
      BGM - the background music volume
      SFX - the sound effects volume
      parentControl - whether parental controls are enabled
      revivePet - whether the pet revival feature is enabled
      timeLimit - the time limit for gameplay

  • Method Details

    • loadItemsFromJson

      public static List<Item> loadItemsFromJson()
      Loads a list of Item objects from a JSON file named "settingsSaves.json".
      Returns:
      a list of Item objects, or null if an error occurs

    • getBGM

      public int getBGM()
      Gets the background music (BGM) volume.
      Returns:
      the BGM volume

    • setBGM

      public void setBGM(int volume)
      Sets the background music (BGM) volume.
      Parameters:
      volume - the BGM volume to set

    • getSFX

      public int getSFX()
      Gets the sound effects (SFX) volume.
      Returns:
      the SFX volume

    • setSFX

      public void setSFX(int volume)
      Sets the sound effects (SFX) volume.
      Parameters:
      volume - the SFX volume to set

    • getParentControl

      public boolean getParentControl()
      Gets whether parental controls are enabled.
      Returns:
      true if parental controls are enabled, false otherwise

    • setParentalControl

      public void setParentalControl()
      Enables parental controls.

    • getParentPassword

      public String getParentPassword()
      Gets the parental control password.
      Returns:
      the parental control password

    • setParentPassword

      public void setParentPassword(String password)
      Sets the parental control password.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to set

    • checkParentPassword

      public boolean checkParentPassword(String enteredPassword)
      Checks if the entered parental control password matches the stored password.
      Parameters:
      enteredPassword - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise

    • getTimeLimit

      public String getTimeLimit()
      Gets the gameplay time limit.
      Returns:
      the time limit in the format "hh:mm"

    • setTimeLimit

      public void setTimeLimit(String time)
      Sets the gameplay time limit. Validates the input format ("hh:mm") and checks that the hours are between 0-23 and the minutes are between 0-59.
      Parameters:
      time - the time limit to set, in the format "hh:mm"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the time format is invalid or out of range

    • isRevivePet

      public boolean isRevivePet()
      Gets whether the pet revival feature is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if the pet revival feature is enabled, false otherwise

    • revivePet

      public void revivePet()
      Revives a pet by creating a new Pet instance.
